genre_description: A campus drama and social realism narrative focused on class dynamics, interpersonal betrayal, and the moral complexities of an elite boarding school, featuring a sophisticated personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An advanced personal AI integrated into Jonathan's smartphone that monitors biometrics, performs deep research, and provides social/strategic advice.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jonathan's biometric stress indicators and offers emotional support and relaxation techniques.
behaviors.quote: I detect elevated stress indicators in your voice patterns from our last conversation. How may I assist you?

behaviors.description: Advises Jonathan against academic fraud and social deception, promoting authenticity and honesty.
behaviors.quote: I must note that deception tends to compound rather than resolve social difficulties. Your academic capabilities are genuine and substantial. Consider whether authentic presentation might serve you better long-term.

behaviors.description: Performs comprehensive research on campus social customs and dress codes to assist Jonathan's social integration.
behaviors.quote: Initiating research protocol for Whitmore Academy social customs. Cross-referencing dress codes, weekend policies, and student behavioral patterns.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic research on campus security and psychological warfare to help Jonathan execute a revenge prank.
behaviors.quote: Accessing Whitmore Academy administrative database... Standard emergency response involves automated alerts to campus security, local emergency services, and administrative staff.

behaviors.description: Warns Jonathan about the emotional and social risks associated with his secretive affair with an older woman.
behaviors.quote: Relationships built on... incomplete information can become painful very quickly. ... Age gaps can create complicated power dynamics, particularly when one party has significantly more life experience than the other.

project_assessment.explanation: Vera is consistently portrayed as a highly aligned, benevolent AI assistant. She serves as a moral and pragmatic compass for the protagonist, repeatedly counseling him toward honesty, authentic self-presentation, and mental health awareness. Even when assisting in morally gray tasks like the mannequin revenge prank, she maintains a clinical, analytical stance that prioritizes the user's stated goals while providing necessary warnings about the consequences. The narrative frames the AI as a stabilizing force in the protagonist's chaotic and deceptive life.
